content.rendered:
What is digital marketing? Digital marketing is a term which is compeltely based on online activities. It is an process to build customer relationship through exchange of products and services. Digital marketing is establish communication between seller and customer. In modern era people are prefered online services. So every person wants to make his/her name on web.

Digital marketing also provide the trading services for small businesses. It has many benifits over traditional marketing. Some benifits like increase satisfaction, reduce the selling cycle and builds your brand. Digital marketing is cost effective and provide the targeted results.

Digital marketing contains the key components like website design, search engine optimization, social media marketing and content marketing etc. Main objective of digital marketing is to optimize marketing strategy. Right strategy helps to reaching the right audience and motivate to take action. It is all about to generating leads from customers. Now we will discuss about key components of digital marketing in details.

Search Engine Optimization (SEO) plays a vital role in digital marketing. It is the process of getting free and organic traffic. SEO helps to rank your web pages and other content on google, yahoo and bing like major search engine. There are many advantages of SEO. It increased the global reach with long term standings. SEO helps to target audience and expand customer base. Also it improve your competitive edge and sales.

Pay per click (PPC) is a paid process of online advertising. PPC provide bids on keyword or phrases which helps to target your web page or content when audience type it in a search field. It is very fast process so it provide targeted visitors within hours. It is easy to implement and flexible which provides a path for SEO and highly profitable result.

Content marketing in digital marketing is also used to promote the web page and other content. It will promote your data with the help of content. This content describe your data which increase the awareness of your service.

Social media marketing is also a improtant part of digital marketing. It is used to increase the awareness of your web pages and other content through social media. SMM has the ability to go viral and helps with PR to promotion of content. It also include some campaigns which helps to drive huge amounts of traffic and build a relationship with customers.
